summary: A feisty young woman returns to Glasgow to run her deceased father's curry house.

Smith|Rita Wolf|Kathleen McDermott|Kulvinder Ghir|Hritika Thaker|Kavita Dass|Tariq Mullan|Adam Sinclair|Francisco Bosch|Umar Ahmed|Raad Rawi|Gillian J. Anderson|Lynne Anderson|Rebecca Green|Lynsey Hatfield|Maggs McMahon|Djalenga Scott|Sara Kelly
title: Nina's Heavenly Delights
